snippet: You want to believe that the buyers will treat your employees, customers and vendors with the same respect you did. But they probably won’t.
abstract: You want to believe that the buyers will treat your employees, customers and vendors with the same respect you did. But they probably won’t.

headline.main: It's O.K. to Sell Your Business to the Highest Bidder
headline.print_headline:
It’s O.K. to Sell
For Highest Bid
